Detailed Description

Class with methods that allow finding matches in an omnidirectional multi-camera system.

Definition at line 258 of file FeatureMatcher.cpp.

std::vector< std::vector< Match > > FeatureMatcher::findOmniMatches ( std::vector< cv::Mat >  imagesPrev,
std::vector< cv::Mat >  imagesCurr,
std::vector< std::vector< Feature >>  featuresPrev,
std::vector< std::vector< Feature >>  featuresCurr,
int  numCameras 
)

Find matches in an omnidirectional multi-camera system. Matches are search in each camera and between onsecutive cameras.

Parameters
std::vector<cv::Mat>vector with all cameras' images in the previous frame
std::vector<cv::Mat>vector with all cameras' images in the current frame
std::vector<std::vector<Feature>>vector with all cameras' features found in the previous frame
std::vector<std::vector<Feature>>vector with all cameras' features found in the current frame
intnumber of images
Returns
std::vector<std::vector<Match>> vector with each camera's matches
